Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp23.recnplay

Class RecordReplay

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp23.recnplay.RecordReplay
public class RecordReplay
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for recording and replaying the game play. Each movement of Chap is recorded and saved to allow for a replay of a list of recorded moves.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RecordReplay()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addMoves​(Tile.Directions d)
    Add the movements of the player to an arraylist.
    static void endRecording()
    Ends the recording of the game.
    static boolean getIsGameRecording()
    Returns whether the game is being recorded or not.
    static void iterateReplay​(Game g, GraphicalInterface gui)
    Iterates through the replay one movement at a time until there are no movements left to replay.
    static void loadRecord​(java.lang.String saveFile, GraphicalInterface gui)
    Loads a recording from a specified file into the Game.
    static void newSave​(Game g, java.lang.String s)
    Creates a new save file of recording.
    static void runReplay​(Game g, GraphicalInterface gui)
    Uses a thread to go through the replay at a certain speed/delay.

    • RecordReplay

      public RecordReplay()

  • Method Details

    • newSave

      public static void newSave​(Game g, java.lang.String s)
      Creates a new save file of recording. Also calls persistence to save the current game file.
      Parameters:
      g - - instance of game.
      s - - name of save file.

    • addMoves

      public static void addMoves​(Tile.Directions d)
      Add the movements of the player to an arraylist.
      Parameters:
      d - - direction of player movement.

    • saveRecording

      public static void saveRecording​(Game g)
      Saves the movements to a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      g - - instance of game.

    • endRecording

      public static void endRecording()
      Ends the recording of the game. Also clears fields to allow for new recordings to be made.

    • loadRecord

      public static void loadRecord​(java.lang.String saveFile, GraphicalInterface gui)
      Loads a recording from a specified file into the Game.
      Parameters:
      saveFile - - file name.
      gui - - instance of gui.

    • iterateReplay

      public static void iterateReplay​(Game g, GraphicalInterface gui)
      Iterates through the replay one movement at a time until there are no movements left to replay.
      Parameters:
      g - - instance of game.
      gui - - instance of gui.

    • runReplay

      public static void runReplay​(Game g, GraphicalInterface gui)
      Uses a thread to go through the replay at a certain speed/delay. Uses iterateReplay() to step through recursively.
      Parameters:
      g - - instance of game.
      gui - - instance of gui.

    • setDelay

      public static void setDelay​(long d)
      Set the delay of the replay.
      Parameters:
      d - - delay.

    • getIsGameRecording

      public static boolean getIsGameRecording()
      Returns whether the game is being recorded or not.
      Returns:
      - isGameRecording
